_comments.basic: Use multiple objects in the same format to define multiple conditions.
_comments.selector: The custom element selector will go here.
_comments.isMatch: If false, the test won't bucket if this element is in the DOM; if true, the test runs if the element is present.
_comments.waitingTime: The waiting time in milliseconds before checking the element.
_comments.totalElementNumber: The expected number of elements that should match the condition.
